revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NBG6716 |revision= |upc=760559120535 |ean= |asin=B00FRX2U1W |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/09/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I88NBG6716,U2M-PCE4550AH |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV137.005B, 1252, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835EMI-10G |fla2=256 |fla2_brand=Hynix |fla2_model=H27U2G8F2CTR-BC |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe,USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, internal |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV137.005B, 1252, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Senao PCE4550AH |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4E;QCA9880-BR4E; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, EP1467.1B, 1306, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15B;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;3; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=FC:F5:28 |oui_eth=FC:F5:28 }} {{TagLine|Simultaneous Dual-Band Wireless AC1750 HD Media Router}} :[http://www.zyxel.com/uk/en/products_services/nbg6716.shtml?t=p Product page] (UK) {{â€¢}} [http://www.zyxel.es/ZyPartner13/pg_dh_2013_spring.pdf In this Spring 2013 '''ZyXEL''' Product Guide]
This device has an upright design like the [[ZyXEL NBG5715]]. {{see also|ZyXEL NBG6617|Senao}}
{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6716_a01}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6716}}
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32331-zyxel-nbg6716-simultaneous-dual-band-wireless-ac1750-hd-media-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :FC:F5:28 OUIs shown *[http://galeria.tech-blog.pl/ZyXEL-NBG6716/ Gallery on '''Tech-Blog''']
===FCC info=== Per its FCC photos, this device is using the following... *"7016A068100g V-1.00" is silkscreened on the main board. :This is a '''Senao''' board code, indicating this is a '''Senao''' manufactured device. *The ''Macronix'' Flash appears to be a 16 MB MX25L128<....>EMI-10G <!--or something similar--> *A [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558-AT4A @720MHz WiSoC ** w/ 3x [https://www.microchip.com/wwwproducts/Devices.aspx?dDocName=en550471 ''Microchip'' (''SST'') SST12LP15B] 2.4GHz High-Power Amp * "PCE4550AH-0.10 LFP" is silkscreened on the board above the U.FL jacks. The text indicates the module is a [[Senao PCE4553AH]]. :The card is using three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1504 ''Skyworks'' SE5003L1] 802.11ac WLAN PAs
Per the FCC manual... *An OUI of FC:F5:28 (''ZyXEL'') is shown on the status screen. *The shown sample SSIDs used follow the format of ''ZyXELXXXXXX'' <!--for both bands--> :The 5GHz SSID is shown to have the last 6 digits of MAC of used by the 2.4GHz SSID incremented by one.
===Additional information=== A C2PC made 2014-02-25 indicates that the serial flash was downgraded to a 4MB chip and the NAND flash was downgraded to a 128MB (1Gbit) chip (H27U1G8F2BTR as shown in the internal photos).
It isn't known which devices this applies to, but newer NBG6716s or derivative models may indeed have reduced flash storage..
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''DVE''' DSA-24PFD-15 FUS 120200.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=DVE |model=DSA-24PFD-15 FUS 120200 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |manuf_country=China |style=small, horiz. }}
